name: rolling dice (ToastedGame)
description:
Rolling dice Goal of the game

Rolling dice is a 2d game where you have to roll up to the card of hearts and you have to have more moves than the value of the card

the only one who can help you is the ace that, unlike hearts, will give you moves

use strategy and logic as in poker or blackjack to complete the levels, but be careful not all friends are friends
